text.Prompt:
Generate a product description using the following product title and specifications.

Product title:
Officially LIcensed by the NFL - Dallas Cowboys Dog Football Jersey - X-Large

Product specifications:
-Officially Licensed by the NFL - Dallas Cowboys Dog Jersey
-Constructed of Breathable Micro-Mesh Polyester
-Features Official Team Number Font and Embroidered Logo on Sleeve
-Stylish V-Neck Cut Allows for a Comfortable Fit
-Decorated in the USA
text.Response A: It's time to let your furry fan show their team spirt with this officially licensed Dallas Cowboys dog jersey. This stylish and comfortable jersey is constructed of breathable micro-mesh polyester and is decorated right here in the USA. It features the official team number font and embroidered logo on the sleeve. The stylish v-neck cut allows for a comfortable fit.
text.Response B: This NFL officially licensed Dallas Cowboys Dog Football Jersey is made of breathable micro-mesh polyester and is decorated right here in the USA. The stylish V-Neck cut allows for a comfortable fit for your pet. It features an official team number font and embroidered team logo on the sleeve. Let your dog wear this officially licensed NFL pet jersey and support your favorite team!

meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
